name: Sonendo, Inc.
description: Sonendo, Inc. is a medical technology company that focuses on developing innovative solutions for endodontics, which is the dental specialty concerned with treating the interior of the tooth. Founded in 2015, Sonendo is dedicated to improving patient outcomes through the application of advanced technology. The company’s flagship product, the GentleWave System, utilizes a patented technology that combines ultrasonic energy with a unique fluid dynamics approach to clean and disinfect the root canal system more effectively than traditional methods. This minimally invasive procedure not only enhances the efficiency of root canal treatments but also addresses the limitations associated with conventional approaches, improving patient comfort and recovery. Sonendo is committed to advancing the field of dentistry by partnering with dental professionals and continually investing in research and development to create new treatment modalities. With a strong focus on innovation, Sonendo aims to transform the endodontic landscape and provide superior options for both dentists and their patients.
ceo: Cameron R. G. M. D. J. J. M. C. D. H. A. C. C. A. C.

key_executives.name: Cameron R. G. M. D. J. J. M. C. D. H. A. C. C.

seo.meta_description: Sonendo, Inc. is revolutionizing endodontics with the GentleWave System, providing advanced solutions for root canal treatment. Explore our technology and commitment to dental innovation.

faq.question: What is Sonendo known for?
faq.answer: Sonendo is known for its innovative GentleWave System, which improves root canal treatment efficiency and patient comfort.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Sonendo?
faq.answer: The CEO of Sonendo, Inc. is Cameron R. G. M. D. J. J. M. C. D. H. A. C. C.

faq.question: Where is Sonendo headquartered?
faq.answer: Sonendo is headquartered in Laguna Hills, California, USA.

faq.question: What products does Sonendo offer?
faq.answer: Sonendo offers the GentleWave System for enhanced root canal treatments.
